channel.title: Socket closed?
channel.description:
Hmmm.
I log into my private server and it kicks me off! "connection lost blah blah blah"
This is what it says on the runserver.bat
Starting fr33sc4p3 Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted Connection Fully ClientHandler: Accepted from SAMSUNG:1396 Client type: high memory version UserId: 90892313 Dean is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 [client-1-Dean]: Unhandled packet [142, InterFaceId: 65409, size=0]: ][ [client-1-Dean]: Action Button: 0 [client-1-Dean]: Unhandled packet [180, InterFaceId: 65409, size=0]: ][ [client-1-Dean]: Action Button: 0 Game saved for player Dean ClientHandler: Client Dean disconnected. ClientHandler: Rejected SAMSUNG:1397 ClientHandler: Accepted from SAMSUNG:1397 Ultimate PK Server (1): Exception! java.net.SocketException: Socket is closed at java.net.Socket.getInputStream(Unknown Source) at client.<init>(client.java:8359) at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:44) at server.run(server.java:181) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

item.title: Socket closed?
item.dc:creator: @Obuntu Obuntu
item.description:
@Obuntu wrote:

Tried that. Tried deleting all the characters and making a new one…

Is there a way to delete friends list?

Read full topic

item.title: Socket closed?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

try a new char

Read full topic

item.title: Socket closed?
item.dc:creator: @Obuntu Obuntu
item.description:
@Obuntu wrote:

But most of the people on the server USE the friends list…

How can I delete the friends list from the server?

Im running FR33SCAPE.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2007, 11:24:59 AM[/size][hr]It isnt the Friends List.

I checked the Moparscape log and it said this:

[05:17:23] Logging into (Dean, *****)
[05:17:23] Your UID is: 90892313
Error: T1 - 46,0 - 206,249

Please help!!

Read full topic

item.title: Socket closed?
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

make sure no one on the server is using the friends list, this happened to me too

Read full topic

Hmmm.

I log into my private server and it kicks me off! “connection lost blah blah blah”

This is what it says on the runserver.bat
